overview: For these twin boys, a little sibling rivalry is an everyday occurrence.  And no matter how minor the infraction, as far as they're concerned, each quibble is like an act of war. It's easy to imagine that for them, every single day is as thrilling as an action movie, playing out in their heads. They're fighting with all they've got... and even in dreams, the battle rages on.  Our story peeks in on these two boys, and we have a chance to look on as they grow.
title: Good Night
